Missing Push Notification Entitlement - Your app includes an API for Appleâ€™s Push Notification service, but the aps-environment entitlement is missing from the appâ€™s signature. Then, sign your app with a distribution provisioning profile that includes the aps-environment entitlement. If your app does not use the Apple Push Notification service, no action is required. You may remove the API from future submissions to stop this warning. Once the required corrections have been made, you can then redeliver the corrected binary.
Regards,
The App Store team
